articles.title: Ikhsan Fandi brace gives Lions win in front of record crowd; Malaysia coach finds it 'difficult to say' if Singapore deserves victory - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE – A record crowd in a pandemic witnessed a piece of history and some sublime mastery from Lions forward Ikhsan Fandi as the 22-year-old's brace propelled the Lions to a 2-1 victory over arch-rivals Malaysia in a Football Association of Singapore Tri…
